job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Are you excited about developing full stack web applications, that customers love to use? We certainly are, and thats why we're looking for like-minded engineers to join Veritone to help us achieve that mission.</p><p><br></p><p>We are a small software team that develops software for the media and entertainment sector, supporting a variety of use cases from discovering relevant media snippets out of a pool of radio or video content, attribute customer engagement to advertisement campaigns or help agencies produce and place product ads. </p><p><br></p><p>Currently, we're looking for software engineers that can quickly understand business use cases, make good technology choices, and deliver operationally robust software that stands the test of time. We're a small team of engineers that work closely together, using agile software development methodologies. We use predominantly react and nodejs.</p><p><br></p><p>If you have 5+ years full stack experience, understand javascript frameworks and backend services, reach out to me on linkedIn.</p>
